directions: Heat oven to 250°. Arrange tomato halves cut side up on an aluminum foil—lined baking sheet (with rim). Whisk together syrup, oil, thyme, garlic, red pepper and salt and pepper in a bowl and then drizzle over tomatoes. Bake until tomatoes are half-dried and concentrated, 2-3 hours.
ingredients: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
title: Maple Syrup-Roasted Tomatoes
